pages.text: Warp pipes are a good short-range fast travel solution added by Terramity.$(br2)Use them to get around your base quickly, to make a maze only you know, or to travel long distances with many warp pipes linked together.

The plumbers wrench lets you bind and unbind warp pipes together.$(br2)Some warp pipes can only be binded to another, where some can be binded one way. White and black pipes interact uniquely in that black pipes can only be binded to white pipes.
